# API Environment Example (rename to .env in production)

# Server
PORT=3000
NODE_ENV=production
ENABLE_SWAGGER=false
CORS_ORIGIN=https://yourdomain.com,https://admin.yourdomain.com

# Database
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://fresh_shop_user:your_password@localhost:5432/fresh_shop_api

# Redis (Upstash or local)
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL=https://your-upstash-url
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_TOKEN=your-upstash-token

# JWT
JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_32_chars_min
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=15m
REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET=your_refresh_secret_32_chars_min
REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN=7d

# Security
BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=12

# Cookies (optional max-age overrides in ms)
ACCESS_TOKEN_MAX_AGE=900000
REFRESH_TOKEN_MAX_AGE=604800000
